title: GetBACnetProcessIdSelectionProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD GetBACnetProcessIdSelectionProperty : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_PROCESS_ID_SELECTION
Returns the BACnetProcessIdSelection of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object as a CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_PROCESS_ID_SELECTION struct.
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to get.
